title: Introduction to Leadership
content:
Module 2, Lesson 1: Introduction to Leadership

The Hook

This lesson covers Introduction to Leadership as part of the Leadership Principles module in the Learn Management course. Mastery of this topic is essential for building a comprehensive understanding of the subject area.

The Concept

In Introduction to Leadership, you will explore the foundational ideas, practical techniques, and real-world applications that make this area of study both relevant and actionable. Each concept has been carefully selected to build on prior knowledge and prepare you for more advanced topics.

The Illustration

Understanding Introduction to Leadership means being able to apply these principles in professional contexts. You will encounter scenarios, case studies, and examples drawn from real industry practice, helping you translate theory into competence.

Summary

You have completed Introduction to Leadership (Leadership Principles, Lesson 1). Proceed to the quiz to test your understanding, then continue to the next lesson to build further expertise.

quiz.question: Which leadership style involves team members in decision-making?
What is transformational leadership?
options: Inspiring followers to exceed expectations for collective good

quiz.question: What is emotional intelligence?
options: Ability to recognise and manage emotions in self and others

quiz.question: Which model adapts leadership style to follower readiness?
